programme.title: It All Begins With A Song
programme.desc: A film about one of the most important and unknown forces in music: The Nashville Songwriter. With over 50 masters: Ben Folds, Garth Brooks, Brad Paisley, Luke Bryan, Rodney Crowell, Kacey Musgraves, John Hiatt, Keb Mo, Liz Rose, Claude Kelly and more!

programme.title: Facing Waves
programme.desc: Ken Whiting travels to Juneau, Alaska to paddle with whales, bears, glaciers and icebergs on a multi-day sea kayaking adventure.

programme.title: Facing Waves
programme.desc: Ken Whiting tests his canoe and stand up paddle boarding skills on the rivers around St. Louis, Missouri

programme.title: Chef Swap At TheBeach: Sandwiches And Cocktails
programme.desc: It’s beginning to look a lot like Halloween as Chef Mason challenges restaurant neighbors Chef Ben Flores from Crafty Rooster ad Chef Danny Jira from Hop N Wich to swap places and cook up a delicious Southern Sandwich with a side of signature Mac-and-Cheese and a spooky cocktail.

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: Chef Ben and his food-loving mates Jamie and Mike are 4,000 miles from their London homes in Charleston, South Carolina tasting some real Southern food. In 48 hours, they must learn all they can about the local culture and cuisine before cooking a "Southern" dish for local chef and Charleston native Amethyst Ganaway.

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The guys have spent 48 hours in Charleston, South Carolina and now it’s time to put what they’ve learned to the ultimate test as top chef Amethyst Ganaway judges their take on "Soul Food". How will she react?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The next stop on Sorted Food's Epic Southern Road Trip is Savannah, Georgia. In 48 hours they must learn all they can about local culture and cuisine before hosting a dinner party for local chefs to showcase what they’ve learned about Southern food and hospitality. Will the guys be able to learn enough in such a short period of time?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: After exploring Savannah, Georgia for 48 hours learning the ropes of Southern food and hospitality, Chef Ben, Jamie and Mike try hosting a dinner party for local chefs, food writers and Savannah natives. How will these expectant locals react?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: Continuing their American adventure, Ben, Jamie and Mike embark on a 1,000 mile road trip through Kentucky to learn the state’s food offerings. At the end of the trip, Mike and Jamie will take their learnings and go head-to-head in an ULTIMATE KENTUCKY COOK-OFF.

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The guys quest through Kentucky continues as they go deeper into the state and get closer to the Ultimate Kentucky Cook-Off. But have Mike and Jamie learned enough about Kentucky cuisine to pull it off?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The time has finally arrived for Mike and Jamie to battle it out in Sorted Food's Ultimate Kentucky Cook-Off. Who has learned the most on the 1,000 mile road trip to take the win?

programme.title: L.A. Stories
programme.desc: Explore the many sides, senses and cultures of Los Angeles through the eyes of locals who share a passion for the city.

programme.title: Roadfood Adventures USA
programme.desc: Travel the South to find the most colorful roads in the nation and discover delicious food, magnificent scenery, magic moments, and fascinating people all along the way.

programme.title: Notes from the USA
programme.desc: Musicians Foy Vance and Laetitia Sheriff head to the US to discover some of the country's most iconic cities.

programme.title: Just Landed
programme.desc: Jim kicks off his journey in Virginia Beach, a coastal gem with a deep-rooted fishing heritage. But Mother Nature has her own plans—as storm clouds roll in, Jim has a challenge ahead: tagging his first Redfish for NOAA to help track its migration.

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Roadside Attractions
programme.desc: Route 66 is lined with wonderful and informative attractions. Here are just a few of those must-see stops!

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Great Stays
programme.desc: Rest your head after a long day driving Route 66. Check in to these great accommodations along the way!

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Scenic Wonders
programme.desc: Mother Nature along the Mother Road. Check out these can’t miss natural wonders on Route 66.

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Delicious Bites
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into these delicious bites from snacks to five star dining on Route 66.

programme.title: Paul & Nick's Big American Food Trip
programme.desc: Paul and Nick cook for some descendants of the Reverend McGregor, the Ulster-Scot who led five ships to New Hampshire in 1714. In the same graveyard where Rev McGregor is buried, Paul discovers a gravestone with his own father’s name on it, and wonders if there could be a connection.

programme.title: Lucky in Love
programme.desc: Rachel and Paul go on a journey of discovery, luck and love through the Big Easy.

programme.title: Small Town, Big Story
programme.sub-title: Small Town Big Story: Where Lobster Is Always On the Menu - Rockland, ME
programme.desc: From lobster lovers to badass lobsterwomen, the charming seaside village of Rockland offers something for everyone—especially during the Rockland Lobster Festival, a delightful combination of games, art, and some of the freshest lobster you'll find anywhere.

programme.title: Small Town, Big Story
programme.sub-title: Small Town Big Story: Man Vs. Train
programme.desc: For over 50 years, bikers from around the world have gathered in Colorado to race the Durango & Silverton Narrow Gauge Railroad Train through the Rocky Mountains, over two mountain passes.

programme.title: Small Town, Big Story
programme.sub-title: Small Town Big Story: Where the Highland Games Come Home - Banner Elk, NC
programme.desc: Just two hours north of Charlotte, Banner Elk offers a wide array of year-around activities for outdoor enthusiasts, but is most well known for their annual Highland Games, one of the largest celebrations of Scottish culture and tradition anywhere in the world.

programme.title: Into America's Wild
programme.desc: Step off the beaten path and connect to your inner trailblazer in this cross-country journey to some of the most beautiful but little-known landscapes of North America. Into America’s Wild is a non-stop ride via kayak, train, bike, hot air balloon and more that explores the transformational allure of wild places and the human connection we all share with the natural world.

programme.title: The Main Event
programme.desc: Join hosts Amon Focus and J. Damany Daniel as they dive into the heart of America’s oldest Mardi Gras celebration in Mobile, Alabama.

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Eric travels to the mountain towns of Durango and Telluride, Colorado to explore the backcountry by ski, snowshoe, and ice axe.

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Eric treks the canyons and waters of Lake Powell, Utah on foot and via packraft.

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: The couple head to southwestern Oklahoma to climb Quartz Mountain but when Jason's confidence is shaken during a failed slab climb, Tayler realizes she may need to prepare to carry a larger load on their journey out west.

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: Failed rock climbing, failed training...struggling marriage? When everything seems to have gone wrong on their road trip in Oklahoma, Tayler and Jason are faced with the question..."are we biting off more than we can chew?" as they head to Wyoming.

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: Jason has attempted to climb the Grand Teton, located in Wyoming, three times before the couple's adventure out west. Will the fourth time be a charm? Or will life's unplanned moments present even greater challenges than Jason anticipated?

programme.title: Get Out of Town
programme.desc: Jaunt through Zion National Park.

programme.title: Get Out of Town
programme.sub-title: Beyond The Big Apple - New York, New York
programme.desc: From vintage planes to miniature trains, adventure comes in all sizes, just a short drive from New York City.

programme.title: Americanos
programme.desc: Explore how Latinx culture brings American cities to life, through the stories of those who embrace their roots and shape the future.

programme.title: Paul & Nick's Big American Food Trip
programme.desc: Paul and Nick are in Madison County, North Carolina in the heart of Southern Appalachia. The roots of Appalachian music and dance can be traced to the 18th century Ulster-Scots settlers. The chefs meet 7th generation ballad singer Sheila Kay Adams and Appalachian dancer and musician Phil Jamison – both of Ulster-Scots descent - to find out more about these traditions.

programme.title: Paul & Nicks Big American Food Trip: Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Paul and Nick cook for the Pastor and members of Donegal Presbyterian Church. They see what’s left of an old oak outside the church, known as the ‘Witness Tree’, where in 1777 people gathered to pray for independence from England.

programme.title: Lucky in Love Ep 1
programme.desc: Canadians Sophie and Anna go on a journey of discovery, luck and love in the Cradle of Liberty, Boston, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Lucky in Love Ep 2
programme.desc: Gabby and Jono try their luck in panoramic Salt Lake City, Utah.

programme.title: Lucky in Love Ep 3
programme.desc: Percy and Michelle go on a game of chance in the Emerald city of Seattle.

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica head to Galveston, Texas, to create a fiery feast for Concetta, the spice-obsessed owner of Maceo Spice & Import Co. From the coastal vibes at Vida Agave to island-famous eats at The Spot, savory classics at Mario’s Seawall, local favorites at Mosquito Cafe, and indulgent sweets from Pattycakes Bakery, they turn up the heat to craft a cheat meal packed with bold flavors and Galveston flair.

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica head to Virginia Beach where they’re tasked by celebrity chef Cliff Crooks to create the ultimate cheat meal for a local restaurateur. Armed with the power of their taste buds, the dynamic duo checks out the best places to eat, including Oishii Burger, Chick’s Oyster Bar and Klassic Doughnuts, to build an off-the-charts meal of epic portions.

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica dive back into Virginia Beach's vibrant food scene to build the ultimate cheat meal for George Culver, the food-loving force behind the popular @iheartfoodvb. From the tropical vibes at Moxy Virginia Beach to the game-filled hangouts at Beachside Social, and the delightful flavors of Oh Mochi, De Rican Chef, and Belvedere South, they pull out all the stops to craft a meal that’s as unforgettable as it is indulgent!

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The next stop on Sorted Food's Epic Southern Road Trip is Savannah, Georgia. In 48 hours they must learn all they can about local culture and cuisine before hosting a dinner party for local chefs to showcase what they’ve learned about Southern food and hospitality. Will the guys be able to learn enough in such a short period of time?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: After exploring Savannah, Georgia for 48 hours learning the ropes of Southern food and hospitality, Chef Ben, Jamie and Mike try hosting a dinner party for local chefs, food writers and Savannah natives. How will these expectant locals react?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: Continuing their American adventure, Ben, Jamie and Mike embark on a 1,000 mile road trip through Kentucky to learn the state’s food offerings. At the end of the trip, Mike and Jamie will take their learnings and go head-to-head in an ULTIMATE KENTUCKY COOK-OFF.

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The guys quest through Kentucky continues as they go deeper into the state and get closer to the Ultimate Kentucky Cook-Off. But have Mike and Jamie learned enough about Kentucky cuisine to pull it off?

programme.title: Epic Southern Road Trip
programme.desc: The time has finally arrived for Mike and Jamie to battle it out in Sorted Food's Ultimate Kentucky Cook-Off. Who has learned the most on the 1,000 mile road trip to take the win?

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.sub-title: Amplify USVI: The Global Stage: St. Croix Blowing Up
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas traces the rich, layered history of St. Croix’s musical roots, uncovering the deep ties to African, European, and indigenous Taíno traditions. Featuring voices like Asta Williams, Willard John, Rashidi Clenance, and Vio International, the episode explores how genres such as quelbe, calypso, and scratch band music were born from the island’s complex past. Through storytelling, performances, and cultural insight, Naydyeyah reveals how the rhythms of resilience and celebration continue to echo through generations.

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.sub-title: Amplify USVI: Roots & Rhythms: The Foundations of St. Croix Music
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas traces the rich, layered history of St. Croix’s musical roots, uncovering the deep ties to African, European, and indigenous Taíno traditions. Featuring voices like Asta Williams, Willard John, Rashidi Clenance, and Vio International, the episode explores how genres such as quelbe, calypso, and scratch band music were born from the island’s complex past. Through storytelling, performances, and cultural insight, Naydyeyah reveals how the rhythms of resilience and celebration continue to echo through generations.

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.sub-title: Amplify USVI: Sound of Revolution: Music as a Voice for Change
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas uncovers the revolutionary spirit woven into the music of St. Croix, where sound has long served as a rallying cry for justice and identity. Through the powerful perspectives of Mada Nile, Ras Attitude, Ras Bach, the Ay-Ay Cultural Dancers, and Kevin Williams, this episode explores how artists have used music to confront oppression, celebrate resilience, and inspire change — from the island’s historic struggles to its modern-day movements.

programme.title: Lucky in Love
programme.desc: Alana and Josh try their luck in Fort Worth, Texas, where cowboys and cosmopolitans walk hand in hand.

programme.title: Lucky in Love
programme.sub-title: Afortunados en el Amor: Rachel y Paul en Nueva Orleans
programme.desc: Rachel y Paul emprenden un viaje de descubrimiento, suerte y amor por Nueva Orleans.
